snippet.textDisplay:
If Nintendo one day stops making it's own hardware, it stands to reason that it's most popular brands will continue to exist on other consoles.
Or maybe Microsoft will fail and Halo will end up Nintendo consoles. You can't really predict these things. I used the example of Sonic because back in the early 90s, I never thought Sega would stop being Nintendo's biggest rival.
And before that, it was thought that video games would be no more than a fleeting fad. It's nice being wrong sometimes.
